title: How to Make Al Baik and Shawarma Garlic Sauce

steps.headline: To make the Al-Baik garlic sauce, get the following ingredients:
steps.description:
1 cup of Mayonnaise 2 table spoons of Garlic Paste (You can make a paste yourself or you can buy it.) ½ Cup of cream cheese
1 medium sized Boiled potato
A pinch of salt
3 tablespoons Lemon juice

steps.headline: Get the following ingredients:
steps.description: 1 cup of Yogurt/Curd. 1 or 2 table spoons of Garlic Paste. Add Salt.

steps.headline: Mix all these ingredients together nicely.

text:
Steps To make the Al-Baik garlic sauce, get the following ingredients: 1 cup of Mayonnaise 2 table spoons of Garlic Paste (You can make a paste yourself or you can buy it.) ½ Cup of cream cheese
1 medium sized Boiled potato
A pinch of salt
3 tablespoons Lemon juice Blend all ingredients together nicely.  Serve.  Shawarma Garlic Sauce Get the following ingredients: 1 cup of Yogurt/Curd. 1 or 2 table spoons of Garlic Paste. Add Salt. Mix all these ingredients together nicely.  Serve.
sentences: Steps To make the Al-Baik garlic sauce, get the following ingredients: 1 cup of Mayonnaise 2 table spoons of Garlic Paste (You can make a paste yourself or you can buy it.)

½ Cup of cream cheese
1 medium sized Boiled potato
A pinch of salt
3 tablespoons Lemon juice Blend all ingredients together nicely.
Shawarma Garlic Sauce Get the following ingredients: 1 cup of Yogurt/Curd.
1 or 2 table spoons of Garlic Paste.
Mix all these ingredients together nicely.
